```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test IsMatrix.")
```



```{r testthat}
test_that("TRUE.", {
  expect_true(
    IsMatrix(matrix(1:10, ncol = 2))
  )
  expect_true(
    IsMatrix(matrix(1:10, nrow = 2))
  )
  # yac_symbol
  expect_true(
    IsMatrix(Ryacas::ysym(matrix(1:10, ncol = 2)))
  )
  expect_true(
    IsMatrix(Ryacas::ysym(matrix(1:10, nrow = 2)))
  )
})
test_that("FALSE.", {
  expect_false(
    IsMatrix(1:5)
  )
  # yac_symbol
  expect_false(
    IsMatrix(Ryacas::ysym(1:5))
  )
})
```
